title: Heartfelt 'Nalla Pusala Dandalu': Rose Gold & Diamond Accent Mangalsutra
materials: Black Onyx Beads. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black onyx beads. Adorned with alternating heart-shaped pendants set with sparkling CZ/American Diamonds. Modern twist on the traditional mangalsutra, designed for everyday wear with a touch of elegance.
occasions: Modern celebrations where you want to showcase your marital status with a touch of contemporary style.
description: A contemporary take on the sacred Mangalsutra (Nalla Pusala Dandalu), blending tradition with modern design. The rose gold finish adds a touch of warmth and luxury, while the CZ diamonds offer a brilliant sparkle. Crafted with durability in mind, ensuring this piece will be a cherished part of your jewelry collection for years to come. Represents love and commitment with a stylish flair.
